If the enemy is under the effect of a debuff, the 'Tarantula' deals additional damage equal to 1000% of Arachne's attack power. If the 'Tarantula' accurately deals a hit, Arachne generates 1 block of her own. The 'Tarantula' ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies. (Cooltime: 0.7 second)

(Passive Added) As the 'Oracle of Water,' Haerang's normal attacks and block skills are activated as 'Oracle's Arrow.'
- 'Oracle's Arrow': Haerang shoots 4 'Oracle's Arrows' at the frontmost enemy that each deal magical damage equal to 500% of her attack power. All 'Oracle's Arrows' activated by Haerang's block skills are acknowledged as 1-chains.

(Cooltime: 2 seconds)
